comparison.description: BetterFleet stands as a performance titan by reducing server search time significantly â€“ displaying a speed 3 to 4 times higher than that of Fleet Creator. When we look at our graph, the green bars, corresponding to BetterFleet, reach inferior values with a consistency that notes an advanced technical optimisation. This means that, concretely, BetterFleet locates the game server with remarkable agility, drastically reducing connection delays. Players can thus expedite a near-instant transition to their favourite virtual worlds, thanks to a concise platform for efficiency and speed. BetterFleet is the guarantee of an uncompromising performance for an unequal user experience.
comparison.subtitle: A turbocharged connection for a triple speed gaming experience!
comparison.title: Comparison with Fleet Creator

descriptions.globe: BetterFleet combines design and efficiency. Inspired by Sea of Thieves artistic direction, you will feel like navigating within an extension of the game at the height of responsiveness.
descriptions.hourglass: Our synchronised auto-click feature implements a perfectly coordinated countdown for every player in the session, ensuring an impressively efficient server research that lowers waiting time to a minimum.
descriptions.key: Our application ensures the security of users thanks to its open source code, allowing full transparency, and a team of active developers dedicated to regular updates and security maintenance.

discord.content: Our application has grown well beyond a simple interface because it is anchored in a vibrant, committed community on our dedicated Discord server. This dynamic space is the crossroads where players can not only share their experiences, but also actively contribute to development by submitting ideas for improvement. Open and constructive dialogue is encouraged, forging synergy between users and creators. In addition, our Discord server provides robust support for those who want to integrate our application on their side. Whether for technical advice, strategic orientations or customization tips, our members and our support team are always ready to help, ensuring a transparent and successful integration.
discord.title: Our favourite exchange platform!

github.content: At the heart of our project is a deep commitment to open source, reflected by our code accessible to all and our team of active and receptive developers. This philosophy guarantees a constant evolution of our application, driven by transparent collaboration and fruitful exchanges with our community. Player feedback is a cornerstone of our development process, as it allows us to fine-tune and improve our offer, by ensuring that it responds precisely to the needs and desires of our users. Openness to suggestions and ability to adapt quickly to our developers ensure that our application remains at the cutting edge, while cultivating a relationship of trust and mutual respect with our committed community.
github.title: Our open source commitment for an application in constant evolution

translation.content: Our application embraces diversity and inclusiveness through its i18n based development opening the door to translations in any language by the community itself. This approach ensures that our application can be easily adapted and used by users around the world. reflecting our commitment to breaking language barriers. In addition, we have set up a public Crowdin project, providing an intuitive platform for all those willing to contribute to the translation efforts. This initiative promotes international collaboration, enabling our application to be enriched by the cultural and linguistic nuances of each contributor. Together, we build a truly global, accessible and engaging gaming experience for an ever-expanding international community.
translation.title: Unite players all over the world with i18n and Crowdin

faq.description: You have a question about BetterFleet? Here we answer the most frequently asked questions
faq.more: You are facing complications or you cannot find an answer to your problem? Meet us here on our

bug.content1: If you encounter any issue or bugs, we encourage you to bring it to our attention so that we can work on improving your experience. Here is how you can contact us:
bug.content2: Discord: Join our Discord server and share your issue in the dedicated support channel. Our team is always ready to help you and answer your questions in real time.
bug.content3: GitHub: If you are familiar with GitHub, you can also open an issue on our GitHub repository. This allows us to structurally track problems and ensure transparent and effective monitoring.
bug.content4: We appreciate your feedback and are committed to resolving reported issues as quickly as possible.
bug.title: How do I report a problem or a bug?

console.content1: Absolutely! We developed specific features to improve the experience of Xbox and PlayStation players. Here is what we implemented:
console.content2: Audio countdown: We incorporated a sound component to the countdown. This function allows users to know exactly when to set sail, without putting upon the alliance leader to give vocal instructions. This makes sessions run smoothly all the while getting around latency caused by online exchange platforms.
console.content3: Visual indication of the platform used: We added an icon to let users know whether their teammates are on a console. This feature promotes better coordination and understanding between players who use different platforms.
console.content4: These enhancements are designed to make gaming experience more intuitive and accessible for console players, ensuring harmonious integration within mixed gaming communities.
console.title: Is it worthy of interest for console players?

data.content1: The confidentiality and security of our users' data are of the utmost importance to us. Here is our policy regarding the management of user data:
data.content2: Data usage: The username and email address are the only required elements for the proper functioning of the application. No other personal data is collected.
data.content3: Security and encryption: The collected data is encrypted and safely stored to prevent any unauthorised access.
data.content4: Cookies and resale: We do not use cookies, and we do not sell nor do we share users' information with third parties.
data.content5: Anonymous data and statistics: For the continuous improvement of our application, we use anonymous data for statistical purposes. Under no circumstances do these data allow users to be personally identified.
data.content6: We are committed to maintaining a certain level of transparency and respecting the privacy of our users at all times.
data.title: What do we do with user data?

download.content3: Follow the onscreen instructions to complete the installation.
download.content4: That's it! After these steps, BetterFleet will be installed on your device.
download.title: How do I install BetterFleet?

eac.content1: BetterFleet ressembles more a logbook than anything else. Its main automatic feature simulates a fairly simple mouse click, just like a voice command would, and does not technically constitute a macro in itself. Systems like Easy Anti-Cheat (EAC) mostly focus on RAM manipulation and therefore have no reason to condemn our method.
eac.content2: Besides, the click is never executed in game and only occurs in the menu, in accordance with the Sea of Thieves and Xbox terms of service (TOS). These terms are broad enough to juridically cover as many situations as possible, but no point mentions our specific use. The option can however be disabled at the user's discretion.
eac.content3: It is still essential to understand that using tools such as BetterFleet and Fleet Creator is not entirely devoid of risks, especially regarding IP detection which remains a sensitive point. Our application is as safe as another, but being neither recognised by Rare nor by Microsoft, we fully depend on their sole decision to take action.
eac.title: Is there any risk with Easy Anti-Cheat? (EAC)

edge.content1: If you have problems running the application or if it crashes after properly installing it, please follow these troubleshooting steps:
edge.content2: Make sure your operating system is Windows 10 or Windows 11.
edge.content3: Check whether Microsoft Edge and Microsoft Edge WebView2 are correctly installed on your device. These components are essential for the proper functioning of the application.
edge.content4: A conflict might occur with your antivirus software. If this one allows it, exclude BetterFleet from the list of present threats. Otherwise, deactivate your software and rerun the application.
edge.content5: If the issue still persists despite these checks, try reinstalling the application in order to fix any potential corruption.
edge.content6: If after these steps the application is still not working, do not hesitate and meet us on our Discord server for more customised assistance.
edge.title: Why does my application crash and/or does not start ?

security.content1: Yes, our application was designed with user security as the absolute priority. Following are the measures we implemented to ensure safe use:
security.content2: Reinforced authentication: We incorporated an authentication overlay in order to strengthen the security of user accounts.
security.content3: Open source: The application is completely open source, offering total transparency concerning its use and operation. This allows the community to verify and audit our code, therefore strengthening confidence in our product.
security.content4: Proactive maintenance: Our developers are committed to maintaining the application in optimal security conditions. This includes regular dependencies updates and continuously monitoring potential security breaches to prevent any risk.
security.content5: Independent approach: As BetterFleet is not licenced by Microsoft, it is subjected to Windows Defender upon installation. Our application is no less secure and we set our sights on adapting to these constraints we cannot quite control.
security.content6: These joint efforts contribute to a reliable and secure platform for every one our users.
security.title: Is the application secure?

update.content1: Whenever an update is available, a pop-up window appears upon launching BetterFleet. You only have to click "Yes" to initiate the update. The application will automatically install the latest version and reboot once the update is complete.
update.content2: Should an update be available while BetterFleet is already running, you can simply close the application. You will be offered to do the update at the next launch.
update.title: How do I update BetterFleet?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

footer.content: Join our worldwide adventure - your passion, our technology. Together, let's transform the game. Powered by the community and open innovation.
footer.discord: Are you having trouble? Get immediately in touch with our team on our
footer.github: Are you a developer and love to sail on the Sea of Thieves? Then come and contribute to the project!

warning.content: BetterFleet is a non-official third party application unrelated to the Sea of Thieves development team. Its use is purely external and has no impact on gameplay experience!
warning.title: Disclaimer

header.details: BetterFleet made its official release! Try out the application now!

presentation.content: Dive into the world of Sea of Thieves with the ultimate tool designed to forge alliances like never before. Our application revolutionises the way players log in, providing exceptional fluidity and significantly increasing your chances of finding an alliance, far surpassing the capabilities of other applications. Join our community and transform your gaming experience into an epic adventure, where bonding and sailing together becomes a reality accessible with every click.
presentation.title: BetterFleet

end.content: Godspeed! May you sail amongst honest seamen and find good wealth at sea! Still... Beware of mutineers, they do fancy the fresh smell of new riches!
end.title: Once the server is found?

howTo.content: In order to create an alliance in Sea of Thieves, players must coordinate their actions with precision. Organisation generally starts long before putting out to sea, upon an time agreed by all participants. The key is to synchronise the exact moment at which everyone clicks on the "Set Sail" button in the game menu, which potentially allows the different crews to find themselves on the same server. This is where BetterFleet enters the scene. So as to help this synchronisation along, the application offers an interface on which players can plan their actions in a coordinated fashion.
howTo.title: How to create an alliance?

1.content: First and foremost, you need to create an account. Upon opening BetterFleet you will be asked to log in with your details so you can access the application.
1.title: Log into the Application

2.content: Select the 'Create Session' option to set up a new space where you can invite other players to join your alliance.
2.title: Session Creation

3.content: A unique code will be managed for your session. Give this code to the friends you want to invite to join the alliance.
3.title: Session Code Sharing

4.content: Ask all players to go to the 'Raise Anchor' menu of the game, or they will be able to prepare to start the game together.
4.title: Gathering in the 'Rising Anchor Menu'

5.content: Each player must then indicate that they are prefer. This is usually done by selecting the Preference option in the application interface.
5.title: Preparation Confirmation

6.content: Once all players are ready, the Mayor of the session (or the leader) initiates a countdown on BetterFleet to coordinate the simultaneous click on 'raise the Anchor'.
6.title: Starting Countdown by Session Mayor

7.content: After joining the game, players must check if they are all on the same server. This can be confirmed through BetterFleet's functionalities or by finding itself at an agreed meeting point in the game. If players do not find themselves on the same server, the process must be repeated from step 5 until the server is found.
7.title: Verification of Strength on Server

whatIsIt.content: An alliance server is a game server where several crews agreed on forming a strategic alliance and cooperating for their mutual benefit. On these servers, players share the same objectives, such as collecting treasures or bringing quests to completion, and shake hands on not attacking each other. The idea is that each and every member benefits from the rewards, therefore optimising profit and gaming experience for everyone. This creates an environment where players can focus on teamwork and exploration rather than being competitive, offering a more laid-back community-based adventure.
whatIsIt.title: What is an alliance server on Sea of Thieves?
